meaningMnemonic: You <radical>poop</radical> twice on a sleeping <radical>drunkard</radical> <radical>person</radical> and you find yourself wondering <kanji>how many</kanji> more times you can poop on them and wonder <kanji>how much</kanji> they can take before they realize what’s going on.
readingMnemonic: As you continue thinking about <kanji>how much</kanji> poop this drunkard can take and <kanji>how many</kanji> more poops you can drop on him, he begins to wake up. Quickly, you <reading>eke</reading> (いく) out one last poop before you scurry away. You eke that poop out just in time to make your escape.
